title: Enhanced bifunctional electrocatalytic activities of hybrid Co(OH)2/MOF-derived materials for green hydrogen production by electrochemical water splitting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2265-2279
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01632C, Paper
Apurba Borah, Sumit, Sathishkumar Palaniyappan, Gaddam Rajeshkhanna
Three alkaline electrolyzers with Co3O4@NF and Co3S4@NF were fabricated for sustainable green H2 production. The electrode materials demonstrated excellent performance in the OER, HER, and overall water splitting, coupled with robust durability.
